name: Commando Shooter Man
description:
DIT Game Design project based on the game Sabatoeur originally made for the Atari 2600.

In this version you play as an American Commando, Abraham Eagleman Washington as he infiltrates a soviet missile hanger with intentions of preventing the construction of a Rocket that will help the evil commies conquer the world.

Inspired by historical events and characters this work of fiction was designed developed produced by a multicultural team of various beliefs or we can also be seen as two plebs.

#Propagandaparody
